}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"AML-S905D3-CC-V1.0C"'' is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Amlogic|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S905D3 @1.9GHz Quad-Core :SoC: ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 1.2 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G31'' MP2 @800MHz (OpenGL ES 3.2, OpenVG 1.1) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, eMMC module socket, :TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM ([[Micron]]) *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 3.0 (Type-A), 1x USB 2.0 (Type-C) ports *Power: 5V/3A via USB (Type-C), PoE header
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.hackster.io/news/libre-computer-s-aml-s905d3-cc-solitude-is-a-low-cost-raspberry-pi-like-sbc-for-edge-ai-projects-d3240091fe7d ''Libre Computer's AML-S905D3-CC Solitude'' on '''hackster.io'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/low-cost-libre-computer-solitude-with-4gb-lpddr4-starts-at-45-00/ ''Low-cost Libre Computer Solitude with 4GB LPDDR4'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Models=== :;[[Libre Computer]] • [[List of SBCs]] *[[Libre Computer Alta]] (AML-A311D-CC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, AI Accelerator *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1GB/2GB, [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media <!-- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B074P6BNGZ --> *[[Libre Computer Sweet Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC-V2) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1GB/2GB, GbE, USB 3.0 <!-- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B078RMQYHS --> *[[Libre Computer Renegade Elite]] (ROC-RK3399-PC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Solitude]] (AML-S905D3-CC) • 2GB/4GB, GbE, USB 3.0
*[[Libre Computer Tritium IoT]] (ALL-H3-CC IoT H2+) • 512MB, 32-bit *[[Libre Computer Tritium H3]] (ALL-H3-CC H3) • 1GB, 32-bit • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium H5]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 2GB, 64-bit <!-- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07D4KTRWR -->
